"So, wanna take a swim?" Plintissa asked Dracona.

"Ummm, I don't like the water so much, too many bots like to splash me!"
Dracona said back. The Radicons were racing, where Airbomber won easily. The
Radicons all started to fight and Dracona sighed. Sinesis and Sinister come
bobbing up from the deep blue sea.

"So, where were you 2 when we were sitting at that boring A with 2 dollar
signs meeting?" Plintissa angrily asked Sinesis and Sinister. Sinesis
shrugged and they jumped back into the water...
